message.content:
cs.DC, cs.MS, cs.NA, cs.SE, cs.PF 

The paper discusses the development of a computational framework for massively data parallel scientific codes suitable for use on petascale/exascale hybrid systems. This suggests that the paper may belong to the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) sub-category. The paper also discusses the development of a new 3D CFD code, which suggests that it may belong to the Modeling and Simulation (cs.MS) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses efforts to improve compiler tools for automatic parallelization and optimization, which suggests that it may belong to the Numerical Analysis (cs.NA) sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of frameworks and programming languages for heterogeneous multi-core systems, which suggests that it may belong to the Software Engineering (cs.SE) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the development of a new computational framework, which suggests that it may belong to the Performance (cs.PF) sub-category.
